sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './about.css' const About = () => { const [state,setState] = useState({ first:"", last:"", email:"", userName:"", pw:"", year:1990, }); const [user,setUser] = useState('react'); function handleChange(e) { setUser(e.target.value); }; function handleSubmit() { alert(state.first + state.last + state.email); }; return (
setState({...state, first: ev.target.value})} placeholder="First Name.." type="text" /> setState({...state, last: ev.target.value})} placeholder="Last Name.." type="text" />
setState({...state, email: ev.target.value})} placeholder="example@domain.com" type="email" /> setState({...state, userName: ev.target.value})} placeholder="Enter Username.." type="text" />
setState({...state, pw: ev.target.value})} placeholder="Enter password.." type="password" /> setState({...state, year: ev.target.value})} placeholder="1990" type="number" min="1901" max="2003" name="year" id="year" /> { user.match("Production Company")? :null } { user.match("Critic")? :null }
) } export default About
